title: Ticket #5370: Parallel jobs with retries cause DAGMan to hang
description:
If a node creates multiple procs, and that node ends up getting retried (at least while some of the procs are still in the queue) DAGMan ends up waiting forever to finish.

(See job_dagman_parallel_retry-A.dag, committed to master.)
